name: yuandake-refractory-website
description: 河南元达科耐火材料有限公司官方网站

scripts.build: echo 'Building project...' && npm run validate && npm run optimize
scripts.build:css: npm run concat:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:js: npm run concat:js && npm run minify:js
scripts.concat:css: cat css/variables.css css/reset.css css/utilities.css css/components.css css/layout.css css/responsive.css > dist/css/main.css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.validate: npm run quality-check && npm run lint-check && html-validate *.html
scripts.cleanup-report: npm run clean-files && echo 'Cleanup report generated'
scripts.health-check: npm run quality-check && echo 'Project health: OK'
scripts.emergency-clean: echo '🚨 Emergency cleanup mode' && npm run clean-files -- --force
scripts.test: npm run validate && echo 'All tests passed!'
